attributes.action: There should be a BBC bitesize revision site for A Levels
attributes.additional_details: Frankly, I find it offensive that the BBC provide a revision resource for Scottish highers and not A Levels. I believe that the BBC should be more inclusive to all education systems and exams. They should be permitted to provide a revision resource for those studying towards their AS and A2 Levels. Many students used this resource during their GCSEs, why did it end straight after?
